episodes.title: Stephen Lynch Targets Pam Bondi Over Epstein Documents In Heated Congress Clash | DRM News | AC1F
episodes.description:
Rep. Stephen Lynch directly accused Attorney General Pam Bondi of obstructing justice and misleading the public over missing Jeffrey Epstein files during a tense House committee hearing. Lynch cited contradictory statements, document delays, and alleged stalling by the Justice Department as lawmakers demanded transparency and accountability in the Epstein investigation. For more details, watch our story and subscribe to our channel, DRM News.

Pam Bondi Accused Of Obstructing Epstein Files As Lynch Grills DOJ In Hearing

Stephen Lynch Targets Pam Bondi Over Epstein Documents In Heated Congress Clash

Pam Bondi Under Fire As Lawmakers Question DOJ Role In Epstein Case

Epstein Files Controversy Grows As Lynch Accuses Pam Bondi Of Obstruction

episodes.title: Oversight Committee Clashes Over Epstein Documents | AC1F
episodes.description:
House Oversight Committee debates access to Jeffrey Epstein-related documents as members clash over subpoenas and special accommodations for former President Bill Clinton and Secretary Hillary Clinton. Democrats allege obstruction by Attorney General Pam Bondi and the DOJ, while Republicans defend enforcement of subpoenas and the necessity of questioning the Clintons. For more details, watch our story and subscribe to our channel, DRM News.

Oversight Committee Clashes Over Epstein Documents

Democrats, Republicans Spar Over Clinton Subpoenas

Epstein Files Dispute Escalates In Congress

Contempt, Subpoenas, And Clinton Testimony Debate

episodes.title: Moonies Cult’ and the Assassination of Abe: Japan’s Most Influential Cult Explored | DRM News
episodes.description:
The killing of Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe shocked people after the killer revealed his motives. Tetsuya Yamagami said he killed Abe because of his links to the ‘Unification Church’, popularly perceived as a ‘cult’ with massive levels of influence in Japan, historically. Known for its mass-weddings, aggressive fundraising campaigns, and the near-messianic presence of its leader Moon, the church wields tremendous influence over its followers. What exactly is this church which has been able to amass such influence in Japan and what kind of criminal activities is it entangled in? 

Credits
Lead reporter: Aiza Nadeem
Video editing and animations: Aiza Nadeem, Abdul Muneeb
Managing Editor: Zia ur Rehman
Chief Editor: Syeda Amna Hassan

Sources:
